location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Rough Sketch Map Showing Approx: Area of Murra Tribal “Dira” from Baduin Sources’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pencil and crayon with additions in red ink on tracing paperDimensions:392 x 330 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.Map by Harold Richard Patrick Dickson, Lieutenant-Colonel, Political Agent to Kuwait showing the area occupied by the Al Murrah tribe and the approximate location of the other major tribes across the region with Bertram Thomas’ route across Al Khali (Empty Quarter) inserted in red.Map has numerous pencil additions. In the title the word ‘Murra’ is changed to ‘Morrah’ and ‘from Baduin Sources’ is added. Signed and dated ’23.8.35’.
